projectData.description: A modern anime site, Features 100% responsive design, seamless navigation, and interactive elements, enhancing the browsing and downloading experience across all devices for anime enthusiasts.

A visually striking portfolio for a graphic designer, crafted to highlight creativity and skill. It features seamless navigation and a gallery of diverse projects, creating an impactful presentation for potential clients.

A personal portfolio showcasing development skills and projects in a clean, engaging layout. Designed to make a strong impression with easy navigation and thoughtfully presented work, reflecting both creativity and professionalism.

A modern, responsive weather app built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS. It fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API, showing temperature, humidity, wind speed, and dynamic icons for any city worldwide.

A simple, user-friendly calculator, featuring basic arithmetic operations, percentage calculations, and real-time input history. Part of The Odin Projectâ€™s curriculum, it supports both mouse and keyboard input.
A browser-based Etch-A-Sketch clone that allows users to draw on a grid using customizable colors. It brings out creativity with a simple, customizable grid, making sketching easy and enjoyable.

A simple web-based implementation of the classic tic-tac-toe game. It allows two players to take turns placing their markers ('X' or 'O') on a 3x3 grid until one player wins or the game ends in a draw.
A digital library management tool where users can add, manage, and remove books. it simplifies personal library organization with a clean interface and basic CRUD functionality.
